DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , efficacy , tolerability treatment Liposonix System ( Model 2 ) use single pas technique .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Treatment Adipose Tissue With Liposonix System ( Model 2 ) Using New Treatment Method
DOC.criteria: Male female , 18 65 year age Body Mass Index ≤30 kg/m2 Thickness subcutaneous adipose tissue anticipate treatment area ≥ 2.3 cm Subjects must agree alter normal regular diet exercise routine course study Subject must understand nature study sign IRB approve Informed Consent Subject pregnant Subject diagnose coagulation disorder receive anticoagulant therapy medication dietary supplement impede coagulation platelet aggregation Subject diabetes cardiovascular disease Subject prior aesthetic procedure region treat Subject previous open laparoscopic surgery anticipate treatment area Subject prescription counter weight reduction medication program , weight reduction procedure Subjects undergo chronic steroid immunosuppressive therapy Subject cardiac pacemaker implantable electrical device Subject History cancer Subject sensory loss dysesthesia area treat Subjects unable , lack capacity , self consent
